insert into user_sys_user (createTime, deleted, duty, email, `name`, nickName, `password`, phoneno, sex, `state`, `type`, updatePwdTime, userName, organId, organName, organNo) values (#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatepwdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_sys_user set createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneno = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatePwdTime = #{updatepwdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organId = #{organid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organName = #{organname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organNo = #{organno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, deleted, duty, email, `name`, nickName, `password`, phoneno, sex, `state`, `type`, updatePwdTime, userName, organId, organName, organNo from user_sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
